course.title: Proseminar on Inequality and Social Policy III
course.description: Students develop previously completed papers from Sociology 296a or 296b into professional presentations and publishable articles, critique peer papers across disciplines, and discuss presentations of national experts.
course.prerequisites: Sociology 296a/Gov 2340a and Government 2340b/Soc 296b (or SUP-921 and SUP-922 at the Kennedy School).
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as SUP-923.
